name: Piper Betle Linn
description: Betel (Piper betle Linn), also called Golden Heart of Nature, is often used as traditional medicine.  Betel plant play synthesizer module in real time with MIDI biodata sonification device. Combine with generative sounds of eurorack modular synth. Inspired by plant perception and ‘The Secret Life of Plants’ (book, 1973). [For full experience : consider to set full screen, and unmute / don't forget to turn the sound on]. Created by @FahmiMursyid (Twitter). More info and updates : ideologikal.bandcamp.com
